Title: Establishes employment goals for minority-owned and women-owned businesses in accordance with the provisions of the most recent disparity study
Summary: Establishes employment goals for minority-owned and women-owned businesses in accordance with the provisions of the most recent disparity study.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing employment goals for minority-owned and women-owned businesses in accordance with the provisions of the most recent disparity study
